name: discord-onboarding-bot
description: Modular Discord onboarding bot with CAPTCHA, profile modal, alliance selection, and admin commands.

scripts.help:
echo "Available scripts:
- npm start: Start the Discord bot with warning traces
- npm run dashboard: Start the web dashboard with warning traces
- npm run both: Start both bot and dashboard
- npm run both-trace: Start both with full deprecation traces
- npm run dev: Start bot in development mode with warning traces
- npm run dev-both: Start both in development mode
- npm run debug: Start bot with debugger and warning traces
- npm run trace-deps: Show deprecation traces
- npm run install-deps: Install all dependencies"

author: Benjamin
